review_blob: Just for info to all who drank The Kovasko pivo penina Izabela Svetlo at the Danish Ratebeer Summer Gathering 2015 and others. It was probably already defective, because this bavarage is without any preservatives, additives and non-pasteurized so it must always be at the temperature betwen 1-6 degrees Celsius and you must drink it in 30 days...so I am almost 100 % it was not properly stored. I drank it and believe me it was not as near as so bad you are writing about.
